channel.title: USA on Don't Blame The Data
channel.description: Recent content in USA on Don't Blame The Data

item.title: How the narrative changed after the Boomers' win
item.description: On the 24th of August, 2019, the Australian Men’s Basketball team, the Boomers, created history when they were able to enact their own David and Golliath moment, taking down Team USA for the first time ever. More impressively was the fact that the US hadn’t lost a game in 13 years. It was a marvelous moment in Australian basketball history, and while the US fielded what is widely considered one of their weaker teams, it was a moment for us to all savour.
